feedback.invalidForm: There was an issue with your form submission. Please check for errors and try again.
feedback.sendEmailFailed: An error occurred trying to send an email.
feedback.error_404: The requested page could not be found.

account.resendConfirm_link: Send me a new confirmation link via email
account.invalidResendLink: Your resend link is invalid. Please try to get a new one, or contact support.
account.unconfirmed: Your account email address has not been confirmed.

validation.email_valid: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.emailconfirm_match: Both Email Address entries must match.
validation.password_minLength: Passwords must be at least {{minLength}} characters.
validation.password_digit: Passwords must have at least one digit ('0' - '9').
validation.password_uppercase: Passwords must have at least one uppercase character ('A' - 'Z').
validation.password_special: Passwords must have at least one non alphanumeric character.

links.passwordRequirements: Click here to show password requirements

feedback.confirm_message: We've sent you an email to confirm your account. Please follow the link in the email.
feedback.existingUser: There is already a user registered with that email address.
feedback.emailNotAllowlisted: The email address provided is not eligible for registration.

feedback.loginFailed: We couldn't log you in with the username and password you provided.

feedback.busy: Please wait while we confirm your account
feedback.success: Your account is confirmed and you have been logged in.
feedback.error: An error occurred trying to confirm your account.
feedback.invalidLink: Your confirmation link is invalid, or the token has expired.

feedback.busy: Sending account confirmation link via email
feedback.success_message: We've sent you an email to confirm your account. Please follow the link in the email.

feedback.success: If there is an user account associated with that email address, we'll send an email with instructions on how to reset your password.

feedback.busy: Sending password reset link via email
feedback.success_message: We've sent you an email with instructions on how to reset your password. Please follow the link in the email.

feedback.invalidLink: The password reset failed. Please request a new reset link, or contact support.
